section.title: Contributor Roles
section.para:
Three different levels of contribution:
Extended Education Team
Use the OpenStack Training material at http://docs.openstack.org/trunk/openstack-training. If you find a mistake or something that can be improved use the link at the end of each section and submit a bug.
Community Team
We need Community Team members to take ownership of creating a section of the material at a time. Each user story in the story board represents something that a trainee needs to learn.
If you are not familar with the tools and process of how to contribute code to OpenStack. Review and understand fix a documentation bug as a starting point. If you have questions start with an email to openstack-docs@lists.openstack.org, or find colinmcnamara or sarob on irc.freenode.net channel #openstack-docs, or tweet @colinmcnamara @sarob.
From the Training Trello/KanBan storyboard assign a user story from the Sprint Backlog to yourself
Then follow the create a branch instructions
More details here under editing code instructions.
We also have bugs that need fixing. Monitor the blueprint page here https://blueprints.launchpad.net/openstack-manuals/+spec/training-manuals and fix a bug.
Optional attendance at the weekly IRC meetings
Core Team
Mandatory attendance at the weekly IRC meetings
Mandatory attendance at the Day Sprints when called
Review patches and bugs
Take up Community Team member responsibilities as well time permitting
